Package src.cinema

Class MovieScreening

Object
MovieScreening
public class MovieScreening extends Object
An instance of a movie screening. Typically created within a cinema hall

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    (package private) int
    Cinema
    Cinema hall that the screening will take place at.

    The path to the text file containing all information regarding the occupancy of this movie screening

    An array of seats for this particular movie screening

  • Constructor Details

    • MovieScreening

      public MovieScreening(int cinema, Date startDate, Date endDate, String movie, TypeOfMovie typeOfMovie, String cineplex) throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads an instance of a movie screening. Loads up any relevant information regarding this movie screening if it had been created before. Otherwise create a new text file with an empty cinema
      Parameters:
      cinema - The cinema hall that the screening will take place at
      startDate - The start time and date of the screening
      endDate - The end time and date of the screening
      movie - The movie title that will be screened
      typeOfMovie - The type of movie screening that this will be
      cineplex - the type of Cineplex this is
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

      Lists the vacancy available for this movie screening

    • updateVacancy

      public void updateVacancy(int SeatID) throws IOException
      Used to change the occupancy of a seat from false to true Typically used when buying tickets
      Parameters:
      SeatID - The seat that will be booked by the guest
      Throws:
      IOException
